sentences.english: Filtrates produced from antagonistic bacteria were also inhibitory to growth of V. dahliae.
sentences.chinese: 这些拮抗菌的培养滤液也能抑制棉花黄萎菌的生长。

sentences.english: Filtrates produced from antagonistic bacteria were also inhibitory to growth of V. dahliae.
sentences.chinese: 这些拮抗菌的培养滤液也能抑制棉花黄萎菌的生长。

sentences.english: Chemical modification was used tO study the structure and function of BR .
sentences.chinese: 用化学修饰研究了菌紫质的结构和功能的变化。

sentences.english: The content of radon gas and methane bacteria indicates obvious abnormity above the gas pool.
sentences.chinese: 气田上方氡气和甲烷菌的含量存在明显的异常。

sentences.english: Conclusion Changes of drug resistance has occurred to the bacteria isolated from in-use disinfectants in school medical rooms.
sentences.chinese: 结论消毒剂在使用过程中污染菌的耐药谱发生了改变。

sentences.english: This fungus victimizes a particular type of cicada found in East Asia, using it as a host in which to propagate.
sentences.chinese: 在亚洲，这种菌通过一种特殊的禅作为宿主繁殖。

sentences.english: It is first time to discover Serratia ficaria as flocculant-producing bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 首次发现无花果沙雷氏菌可以生产絮凝剂。

sentences.english: Termitomyces Heim(1941) is a kind of edible mushrooms with a good business prospects.
sentences.chinese: 鸡菌属菌物是一类具有商业前景的食物蕈菌。

sentences.english: However, current processing techniques for methanotrophic biomass leads to the oxidation of the natural antioxidant.
sentences.chinese: 目前甲烷菌的生产工艺导致了天然抗氧化剂的氧化。

sentences.english: The photoinduced permanent polarization of bacteriorhodopsin was experimentally investigated.
sentences.chinese: 实验摸索了菌紫质激光诱导永久偏振态的产生条件。

sentences.english: Collection of high-concentration cell is the most important step.
sentences.chinese: 高浓度菌体细胞的收集是其生产的关键步骤。

sentences.english: But this doesn’t mean there are no viruses that affect the Archaea.
sentences.chinese: 但是这也并不意味着没有病毒可以影响到古生菌。

sentences.english: The volva of the mushroom is often at the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 蘑菇的菌托通常在底部。

sentences.english: Most often infected wounds are found to harbor ordinary soil-dwelling bacteria, such as the clostridia .
sentences.chinese: 大多数感染的伤口含有普通的土壤细菌，如梭菌。

sentences.english: There existed a definite amount of SRB in the deep aquatic environment.
sentences.chinese: 阿哈湖深层水体中有一定数量的硫酸盐还原菌存在。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the contamination status of foods by L. monocytogenes.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解冷藏冷冻食品中李斯特菌污染状况。
